title: Tick actions: close and edit from board
description:
Add ability to manage ticks from the board UI:

CLOSE:
- Close button on tick cards in Backlog and Agent Queue columns
- Ticks with 'requires' field cannot be closed directly (must use approve/reject)
- Ticks in_progress cannot be closed (agent working)
- Confirmation modal with optional close reason

EDIT (for any open tick not in_progress):
- Change priority
- Change type  
- Change parent epic
- Change owner
- Add/change workflow (requires field)

Implementation:
- Add action menu or buttons to tick detail panel
- PATCH /api/ticks/:id endpoint for updates
- Respect workflow rules (no closing ticks with requires gate)
